Predicting lexical decision latencies in one-character words with CLD & PTT frequency data

Source: vignettes/model_fitting.Rmd
model_fitting.Rmd

Download the source (data + Rmd) here.

LDT = readRDS("lexical_decision_latencies.rds")
tibble::as_tibble(LDT)
#> # A tibble: 3,293 x 10
#>    Character    RT cld.Frequency cld.C1Frequency cld.C1Strokes
#>    <chr>     <dbl>         <dbl>           <dbl>         <int>
#>  1 啊         584.       4215.            3242.             11
#>  2 哎         568.        164.             168.              9
#>  3 哀         579.          2.93            42.5             9
#>  4 唉         688.        141.             109.             10
#>  5 埃         720.          2.40            39.9            10
#>  6 挨         682.         20.4             24.7            10
#>  7 挨         682.         20.4             24.7            10
#>  8 挨         682.         20.4             24.7            10
#>  9 挨         682.         20.4             24.7            10
#> 10 挨         682.         20.4             24.7            10
#> # … with 3,283 more rows, and 5 more variables: pttFreq.2004_2009 <dbl>,
#> #   pttFreq.2010_2014 <dbl>, pttFreq.2015_2019 <dbl>, pttFreq.all <dbl>,
#> #   trad_strokes <dbl>

Reproduce CLD paper

The results below tried to reproduce the results of fitting a linear regression model to the lexical decision latencies for single character words in Table 4 in Sun et al. (2018):

Results of the regression model in Table 4 in Sun et al. (2018)

model_glm = glm(-1000/RT ~ log(cld.C1Frequency) + log(cld.Frequency) + sqrt(cld.C1Strokes), data = LDT)
summary(model_glm)
#> 
#> Call:
#> glm(formula = -1000/RT ~ log(cld.C1Frequency) + log(cld.Frequency) + 
#>     sqrt(cld.C1Strokes), data = LDT)
#> 
#> Deviance Residuals: 
#>      Min        1Q    Median        3Q       Max  
#> -0.37545  -0.09477  -0.00338   0.09179   0.60953  
#> 
#> Coefficients:
#>                       Estimate Std. Error t value Pr(>|t|)    
#> (Intercept)          -1.641230   0.017680 -92.827  < 2e-16 ***
#> log(cld.C1Frequency) -0.042180   0.002350 -17.946  < 2e-16 ***
#> log(cld.Frequency)   -0.007625   0.001627  -4.687 2.88e-06 ***
#> sqrt(cld.C1Strokes)   0.035123   0.004703   7.468 1.04e-13 ***
#> ---
#> Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1
#> 
#> (Dispersion parameter for gaussian family taken to be 0.01881852)
#> 
#>     Null deviance: 95.571  on 3292  degrees of freedom
#> Residual deviance: 61.894  on 3289  degrees of freedom
#> AIC: -3731.7
#> 
#> Number of Fisher Scoring iterations: 2

Adding PTT freqency data

Data: 2004-2019

model_glm = glm(-1000/RT ~ log(pttFreq.all) + log(cld.C1Frequency) + log(cld.Frequency) + sqrt(cld.C1Strokes), data = LDT[LDT$pttFreq.all > 0,])
summary(model_glm)
#> 
#> Call:
#> glm(formula = -1000/RT ~ log(pttFreq.all) + log(cld.C1Frequency) + 
#>     log(cld.Frequency) + sqrt(cld.C1Strokes), data = LDT[LDT$pttFreq.all > 
#>     0, ])
#> 
#> Deviance Residuals: 
#>      Min        1Q    Median        3Q       Max  
#> -0.37896  -0.09449  -0.00446   0.09186   0.61046  
#> 
#> Coefficients:
#>                       Estimate Std. Error t value Pr(>|t|)    
#> (Intercept)          -1.700853   0.033608 -50.609  < 2e-16 ***
#> log(pttFreq.all)     -0.004101   0.001961  -2.091   0.0366 *  
#> log(cld.C1Frequency) -0.040755   0.002441 -16.696  < 2e-16 ***
#> log(cld.Frequency)   -0.005094   0.002029  -2.511   0.0121 *  
#> sqrt(cld.C1Strokes)   0.034523   0.004712   7.327 2.94e-13 ***
#> ---
#> Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1
#> 
#> (Dispersion parameter for gaussian family taken to be 0.01881751)
#> 
#>     Null deviance: 95.211  on 3288  degrees of freedom
#> Residual deviance: 61.797  on 3284  degrees of freedom
#> AIC: -3726.3
#> 
#> Number of Fisher Scoring iterations: 2

Data: 2004-2009, 2010-2014, 2015-2019

model_glm = glm(-1000/RT ~ log(pttFreq.2004_2009) + log(pttFreq.2010_2014) + log(pttFreq.2015_2019) + log(cld.C1Frequency) + log(cld.Frequency) + sqrt(cld.C1Strokes), 
                data = dplyr::filter(LDT, 
                                     pttFreq.2004_2009 > 0, 
                                     pttFreq.2010_2014 > 0, 
                                     pttFreq.2015_2019 > 0))
summary(model_glm)
#> 
#> Call:
#> glm(formula = -1000/RT ~ log(pttFreq.2004_2009) + log(pttFreq.2010_2014) + 
#>     log(pttFreq.2015_2019) + log(cld.C1Frequency) + log(cld.Frequency) + 
#>     sqrt(cld.C1Strokes), data = dplyr::filter(LDT, pttFreq.2004_2009 > 
#>     0, pttFreq.2010_2014 > 0, pttFreq.2015_2019 > 0))
#> 
#> Deviance Residuals: 
#>      Min        1Q    Median        3Q       Max

#> 
#> Coefficients:
#>                         Estimate Std. Error t value Pr(>|t|)    
#> (Intercept)            -1.688212   0.035531 -47.513  < 2e-16 ***

#> log(pttFreq.2010_2014)  0.026580   0.005292   5.023 5.37e-07 ***
#> log(pttFreq.2015_2019) -0.015240   0.003845  -3.964 7.54e-05 ***

#> Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1

#>     Null deviance: 92.564  on 3248  degrees of freedom
#> Residual deviance: 60.893  on 3242  degrees of freedom
#> AIC: -3684.9

#> Number of Fisher Scoring iterations: 2

Adding Traditional Chinese strokes information

model_glm = glm(-1000/RT ~ log(cld.C1Frequency) + log(cld.Frequency) + sqrt(trad_strokes), data = LDT)
summary(model_glm)
#> 
#> Call:
#> glm(formula = -1000/RT ~ log(cld.C1Frequency) + log(cld.Frequency) + 
#>     sqrt(trad_strokes), data = LDT)
#> 
#> Deviance Residuals: 
#>      Min        1Q    Median        3Q       Max  
#> -0.38979  -0.09524   0.00007   0.08744   0.61474  
#> 
#> Coefficients:
#>                       Estimate Std. Error  t value Pr(>|t|)    
#> (Intercept)          -1.581448   0.015018 -105.307  < 2e-16 ***
#> log(cld.C1Frequency) -0.044678   0.002331  -19.170  < 2e-16 ***
#> log(cld.Frequency)   -0.007783   0.001636   -4.757 2.05e-06 ***
#> sqrt(trad_strokes)    0.016539   0.003605    4.588 4.64e-06 ***
#> ---
#> Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1
#> 
#> (Dispersion parameter for gaussian family taken to be 0.01901587)
#> 
#>     Null deviance: 95.571  on 3292  degrees of freedom
#> Residual deviance: 62.543  on 3289  degrees of freedom
#> AIC: -3697.3
#> 
#> Number of Fisher Scoring iterations: 2
model_glm = glm(-1000/RT ~ log(cld.C1Frequency) + log(cld.Frequency) + sqrt(cld.C1Strokes) + sqrt(trad_strokes), data = LDT)
summary(model_glm)
#> 
#> Call:
#> glm(formula = -1000/RT ~ log(cld.C1Frequency) + log(cld.Frequency) + 
#>     sqrt(cld.C1Strokes) + sqrt(trad_strokes), data = LDT)
#> 
#> Deviance Residuals: 
#>      Min        1Q    Median        3Q       Max  
#> -0.37375  -0.09456  -0.00369   0.09141   0.61034  
#> 
#> Coefficients:
#>                       Estimate Std. Error t value Pr(>|t|)    
#> (Intercept)          -1.645517   0.018438  -89.25  < 2e-16 ***
#> log(cld.C1Frequency) -0.042279   0.002354  -17.96  < 2e-16 ***
#> log(cld.Frequency)   -0.007571   0.001628   -4.65 3.44e-06 ***
#> sqrt(cld.C1Strokes)   0.032748   0.005523    5.93 3.35e-09 ***
#> sqrt(trad_strokes)    0.003454   0.004211    0.82    0.412    
#> ---
#> Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1
#>

#> Residual deviance: 61.881  on 3288  degrees of freedom
